trans-unit.source: Provides access and information for manipulating data stores in a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
Creates a new stream with a given name.

This <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.CreateStream%2A> method creates a new stream with <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo> default settings set to CompressionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed> and EncryptionOption.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption.None>.
The name for the new stream.
The new stream with the specified name.
Creates a new stream with a given name, <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.EncryptionOption"></xref>.
The name for the new stream.
The compression option for the data stream.
The encryption option for the data stream.
The new stream with the specified name, compressionOption, and encryptionOption.
Creates a new child <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo"></xref> with this <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo"></xref> as the parent.
The name for the new child data store.
The new child data store.
The name parameter is `null`.
Deletes the stream with a specified name.
The <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo"></xref> name of the stream to delete.
The name parameter is `null`.
Deletes a specified sub-store.
If the specified sub-store itself contains child sub-stores, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.DeleteSubStorage%2A> also recursively deletes all descendant sub-stores.
The name of the sub-store to delete.
The name parameter is `null`.
Returns the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo"></xref> instance with the given name.
The name of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo"></xref> instance to return.
The stream with the specified name.
The name parameter is `null`.
Returns an array of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo"></xref> instances that are currently contained in this store.

<xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetStreams%2A> will always return a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo> array, but the array may be empty (zero-length) if there are no streams defined in the store.
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetStreams%2A> provides a snapshot of the streams currently defined in the store.
The individual <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo> objects will reflect the updated state of their respective streams, but the returned array will not be updated with any additions or deletions.
Call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetStreams%2A> again to obtain an updated array as streams added or deleted to the store.
An array of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo"></xref> objects, each pointing to an I/O steam defined within this store.
Returns the child sub-store with a given name.
The name of the sub-store to return.
The child sub-store with the specified name.
The name parameter is `null`.
Returns an array of the child sub-stores that are currently contained in this store.
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetSubStorages%2A> will always return a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo> array, but the array may be empty (zero-length) if there are no sub-stores.
<xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetSubStorages%2A> provides a snapshot of the sub-stores currently defined in this store.
The individual <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo> objects will reflect the updated state of their respective stores, but the returned array will not be updated with any additions or deletions.
Call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.GetSubStorages%2A> again to obtain an updated array as sub-stores added or deleted to the store.
An array of <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo"></xref> objects, each pointing to a sub-store defined within this store.
Gets the name of the store.
The name of a sub-store is specified to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo.CreateSubStorage%2A> method and cannot be changed after created.
The name of this store.
Returns a value that indicates whether a given stream exists.
The <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StreamInfo"></xref> name to check for.
`true` if a stream with the specified name exists; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether a given child sub-store exists.
The child <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo"></xref> name to check for.
`true` if a child sub-store with the specified name exists; otherwise, `false`.
